Title: Summertime
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), John Wells, LaToya Morgan (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: In the second season premiere, the Gallaghers are hustling in summertime Chicago. While Fiona's bartending at a club, Frank loses Liam in a bet to an angry man named Baby.
